examples: Turn the dial to 10.
The gears turned a dial on the front of the clock.
The gears turned a dial on the front of the clock.
The dial on the topic camera feels really nice.
You have physical dials on the lens.
words.defineEn: to make a phone call by pressing buttons on a phone or turning a numbered disk on the old ones
words.defineVi: để thực hiện cuộc gọi điện thoại bằng cách nhấn các nút trên điện thoại hoặc quay đĩa số trên những cái cũ

examples: Long Island Marine and Olympian boxer Jamel Herring hangs up the gloves after championship career.
As for the future of his boxing career, Taylor continues to maintain that he has hung up his gloves for good.
Although Christian Karembeu hung up his boots in 2005, he is no less an active and unstoppable personality in the world of soccer.
They hung up.
I hung up.
words.defineEn: to end a phone call by breaking the connection
words.defineVi: để kết thúc một cuộc gọi điện thoại bằng cách phá vỡ kết nối

examples: The ambassador was called back to London by the prime minister.
Within minutes, the president calls back.
I'm calling back.
Unlike the Model 3, the ID.3's display calls back to a traditional dashboard with touch-sensitive buttons with haptic feedback.
phone-- Hang up and call back.
words.defineEn: to return a phone call or contact someone again when the first attempt to communicate was missed or unsuccessful
words.defineVi: để trả lời một cuộc gọi điện thoại hoặc liên lạc lại với ai đó khi nỗ lực liên lạc đầu tiên bị bỏ lỡ hoặc không thành công

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Red wine leaves a stain.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to make something be seen, heard, or noticed by delivering, writing or recording something
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó được nhìn thấy, nghe thấy hoặc chú ý bằng cách cung cấp, viết hoặc ghi lại một cái gì đó

examples: May I take a message?
I wrote a message to myself.
The message was finally getting through to him.
She has sixteen unread messages in her inbox.
The machine records your messages and you can answer them at your convenience.
words.defineEn: a written or spoken piece of information or communication sent to or left for another person
words.defineVi: một mẩu thông tin hoặc thông tin liên lạc bằng văn bản hoặc lời nói được gửi đến hoặc để lại cho người khác

examples: "Check your voicemail."
- Check your voicemail.
We have a voicemail.
We have a voicemail.
Your voicemail box is full.
words.defineEn: a system that allows callers to leave recorded messages for someone who is unable to answer their phone
words.defineVi: một hệ thống cho phép người gọi để lại tin nhắn được ghi lại cho người không thể trả lời điện thoại của họ

examples: He's very engaged in environmental issues and volunteers for a local conservation group.
He always sits in the front row during class to stay focused and engaged.
And she became more and more engaged.
and she’s an engaged teacher.
He's always interested in a lot of different things, but those things which he's really interested in, politics and family and faith and sports, he gets deeply engaged.
words.defineEn: involved in a task, project, or other activity, either mentally and emotionally or physically
words.defineVi: tham gia vào một nhiệm vụ, dự án hoặc hoạt động khác, về mặt tinh thần và cảm xúc hoặc thể chất

examples: Swiping a card?
You swipe the right side for volume.
Swipe to flip through them.
Tinder saw its biggest day ever on March 29, with over 3 billion swipes in just one day.
Okay, swipe the touch bar for volume, swipe to the left to switch between active noise cancellation, and transparency for Bluetooth only.
words.defineEn: to hit or strike something with a sweeping motion
words.defineVi: để đánh hoặc tấn công một cái gì đó với một chuyển động quét

examples: The wedding ceremony went off without a hitch.
No wonder some people went off the rails a bit.
The fire alarm went off, and we evacuated the building.
She went off on a tangent about what happened to her last summer.
My dad went off the deep end when he found out what I'd done.
words.defineEn: (of alarms) to start making a lot of noise as a warning or signal
words.defineVi: (của báo động) để bắt đầu gây ra nhiều tiếng ồn như một cảnh báo hoặc tín hiệu

examples: After a heated argument with his parents, David was cut off with a cent and had to find a way to support himself financially.

If you stay home because your ex-boyfriend is at the party, aren't you cutting off your nose to spite your face?
When preparing okra, remember to cut off the ends and avoid overcooking to maintain its texture and flavor.
He was running around like a chicken with its head cut off.
words.defineEn: to end a phone call while the other person is still on the line
words.defineVi: để kết thúc một cuộc gọi điện thoại trong khi người khác vẫn còn trên đường dây

words.defineEn: a telecommunication network allowing calls and messages to be sent and received between phones
words.defineVi: một mạng viễn thông cho phép gửi và nhận cuộc gọi và tin nhắn giữa các điện thoại

examples: But my understanding is that most mortgages compound monthly.
Most collectors work on monthly quotas.
Monthly frequency is called ultra rapid cycling.

This month I am bringing back monthly favourites.
words.defineEn: a magazine or periodical that gets published once every month
words.defineVi: một tạp chí hoặc tạp chí định kỳ được xuất bản mỗi tháng một lần

examples: The company has held the advertising contract since 2005.
Contracts and leases to work the mines.

That contract proved to be a millstone around his neck.
The company has won a contract to supply books and materials to schools.
words.defineEn: an official agreement between two or more sides that states what each of them has to do
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận chính thức giữa hai hoặc nhiều bên nêu rõ những gì mỗi người trong số họ phải làm

words.defineEn: in a suspended state to be considered and dealt with in the future
words.defineVi: ở trạng thái treo để xem xét, xử lý trong thời gian tới

words.defineEn: a payment system in which one is only able to use a service up to the amount that they have paid for, and payment must be made in advance of using the service
words.defineVi: một hệ thống thanh toán trong đó một người chỉ có thể sử dụng dịch vụ với số tiền mà họ đã thanh toán và phải thanh toán trước khi sử dụng dịch vụ
